testcase.name: User can make an advantage search for .gif format
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the homepage...............................................passed When user clicks to expand the advanced search menu.........................passed And user scrolls down and clicks to the file type menu......................passed And from the dropdown menu, user clicks the .gif option.....................passed And user scrolls up and clicks search button................................passed And user clicks for the first result........................................passed Then user sees the image as .gif format.....................................passed
